citations.narrative:
***Four 12 week old Labradoodle puppies were housed in the puppy building. The height of the enclosures
provided approximately 0.5 to 2 inches of head space for the puppies while in a normal standing position. All dogs
and puppies must be provided enclosures that alllow a minimum of 6 inches of free head space while in a normal
standing position. These puppies should be moved to an enclosure with acceptable head space. To be corrected
by: 05/24/19
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.6(c)(1)(iii)
PRIMARY ENCLOSURES.
***Four 12 week old Labradoodle puppies were housed in the puppy building.  The height of the enclosures
provided approximately 0.5 to 2 inches of head space for the puppies while in a normal standing position.  All dogs
and puppies must be provided enclosures that alllow a minimum of 6 inches of free head space while in a normal
standing position.  These puppies should be moved to an enclosure with acceptable head space.  To be corrected
by: 05/24/19
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
